import java.util.Scanner;

public class BinSearch {
static Scanner in = new Scanner (System.in);
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Integer[] data = new Integer[10];

		for(int i =0; i< data.length; i++) {
			data[i] = (int) (Math.random()*100);
		}

		System.out.println("Enter the key you are looking for: ");
		int key = in.nextInt(); 
		for(int i =0; i< data.length; i++) {
			System.out.print(data[i] + " ");
		}
		
		SelectionSort(data);
		System.out.println();
		for(int i =0; i< data.length; i++) {
			System.out.print(data[i] + " ");
		}
		int lower =0;
		int higher = data.length;
		int found = BinSearch(data, key, lower, higher);
		
		System.out.println();
 		System.out.println("The key " + key + " you are looking for is found at position " + found);

	}
	private static Integer BinSearch(Integer[] data, int key, int lower, int higher) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int found =-1;
		if(lower > higher) { // detta betyder att the key finns inte , stopping criteria
			return found;
		}
		if (higher >= lower) {
			int mid = (int) (lower + higher)/2;
			if(data[mid] == key) {
				found = mid;
				return found;
			}
			if(key > data[mid]) {
				return BinSearch(data, key, mid+1, higher);
			}
			if(key < data[mid]) {
				return BinSearch(data, key, lower, mid-1);
			}
		}

		return found;

	}
	private static void SelectionSort(Integer[] data) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int min =0;
		for(int i =0; i< data.length; i++) {
			min = i;
			for(int j = i+1; j<data.length; j++) {
				if(data[j] < data[min]) {
					min = j;
				}	
			}
			if(i !=min) {
				swap(data, min, i);
			}
		}
		
	}
	private static void swap(Integer[] data, int min, int i) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int temp = data[i];
		data[i] = data[min];
		data[min] = temp;
	}

}
